title: Pipeline page header title rename to "Pipeline"

requirements.summary: Change only the Pipeline page header <h1> text to display exactly "Pipeline" while leaving all other labels, description text, and browser tab title unchanged.
acceptanceCriteria: When visiting the internal Pipeline page, the header <h1> displays exactly: "Pipeline".
The Pipeline page description text remains unchanged.
No other UI labels (e.g., sidebar/nav items) are changed as part of this update.
No changes are made to the browser tab title as part of this update.

file_operations.description: Replace the <h1> header text currently sourced from strings.pipeline.title with a hardcoded "Pipeline" (in both the empty-boards state header and the normal page header). Keep strings.pipeline.description as-is, and do not change any navigation labels or document/tab title logic. Ensure the change is limited to the header <h1> only.
